sources.title: The Stranger Game | Full Movie | Psycho Thriller | Mimi Rogers
sources.description:
A hard-working mother hires a male nanny to take care of her son, but soon discovers that he is an antisocial psychopath bent on destroying her family.
2006.  Stars: Mimi Rogers, David Orth, Barclay Hope

metadata.Plot: A busy working woman, played by Mimi Rogers, has to make a tough decision when she decides she needs help taking care of her young son. But she hires the wrong male nanny to lend a hand. Turns out he's a super psycho on a personal mission to destroy her family.
metadata.Actors: Mimi Rogers, David Orth, Barclay Hope
